nodes.text: Talon of Izax was the name of an Eternal Empire Walker walker used during the war against Zakuul. During the Invasion of Voss in 3630 BBY, the walker was deployed on the battlefield near the Shrine of Healing, but was destroyed by an Alliance walker named Storm Rider.
Talon of Izax appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during "Chapter I: Wrath and Ruin".
